plotly_network

Source: R/aux_visuals.R
plotly_network.Rd

provide network segment to draw in 3D plot_ly()

Usage

plotly_network(
  network,
  x = "sdimx_begin",
  y = "sdimy_begin",
  z = "sdimz_begin",
  x_end = "sdimx_end",
  y_end = "sdimy_end",
  z_end = "sdimz_end"
)

Arguments

network

network object

x

default to "sdimx_begin"

y

default to "sdimy_begin"

z

default to "sdimz_begin"

x_end

default to "sdimx_end"

y_end

default to "sdimy_end"

z_end

default to "sdimz_end"

Value

edges in network as data.table

On this page
